mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opera_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, opera_name, open_url, opera_ip, opera_location, opera_param, json_result, status, error_msg) VALUES (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operaName}, #{openUrl}, #{operaIp}, #{operaLocation}, #{operaParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg})
